title: ???? servers ????
body:
what's going on? I'm getting massive DC spikes in the game and my internet works fine, it only happens in league.

I've DC'd at least 7 times in games so far, some claim that it is packet loss shenanigans but I never had any of that, I have a stable high speed connection.

replies.body: Ya I DC'd like 20x in one game. Not playing til we get a fix
